overview.title: About Weight Converter
overview.content: Our weight converter allows you to quickly and accurately convert between different weight measurement units. Supports all major units: grams, kilograms, and pounds.

calculation.title: How Conversion Works
calculation.content: All weight units are converted through the base unit - gram. Each unit has its own coefficient relative to gram, ensuring calculation accuracy.

units.title: Supported Units
units.content: The converter supports 3 main weight units: grams (g), kilograms (kg), and pounds (lb).

advantages.title: Advantages of Our Converter
advantages.content: Accurate calculations, instant conversion, 4 languages support, user-friendly interface, mobile version.

faqItems.q: How to convert grams to kilograms?
faqItems.a: Divide grams by 1000 to get kilograms. For example: 1500 g = 1.5 kg.

faqItems.q: How to convert kilograms to pounds?
faqItems.a: 1 kilogram ‚âà 2.20462 pounds. Multiply kilograms by this factor. For example: 5 kg ‚âà 11.02 pounds.

faqItems.q: How many grams in a kilogram?
faqItems.a: There are 1000 grams in one kilogram. This is the standard metric system.

faqItems.q: How to convert pounds to kilograms?
faqItems.a: 1 pound ‚âà 0.453592 kilograms. Multiply pounds by this factor to get kilograms.

faqItems.q: Wie konvertiert man Gramm in Kilogramm?
faqItems.a: Teilen Sie Gramm durch 1000, um Kilogramm zu erhalten. Zum Beispiel: 1500 g = 1,5 kg.

faqItems.q: Wie konvertiert man Kilogramm in Pfund?
